tittle.en: Machine Learning Open Source Algorithm Platform
tittle.cn: 机器学习开源算法平台

en: The machine learning open source algorithm platform is developed by the Applied Data Mining and Machine Learning Laboratory of Beijing Jiaotong University. It summarizes classic and latest open source algorithms and provides visualization tools, including image classification, object detection, image segmentation, digital watermarking, image enhancement, style Migration, user psychological portrait and other tasks.
cn: 该机器学习开源算法平台由北京交通大学应用数据挖掘与机器学习实验室开发，汇总经典、最新的开源算法，并提供可视化工具，包括图像分类、目标检测、图像分割、数字水印、图像增强、风格迁移、用户心理画像等多种任务。
持续更新算法和任务，敬请期待。

address.en: North 207C, No.9 Teaching Building, Beijing Jiaotong University, No.3Shangyuancun, Haidian District, Beijing, 100044, P. R. China
address.cn: 北京市海淀区上园村3号9号教学楼北207D
